overview:
Chase Murdock (Salt Lake City, USA) is a young entrepreneur and social fundraiser. Chase is currently the CEO & co-founder of Dress Code.

Personal: Culture and language, TED conferences, bonsai trees, coffee, custom suits, motorcycles, reading, lap swimming, US politics, hiking, mask collecting.

Business: Start-ups, new ideas, international import/exporting, survey research, consulting, social media, operations outsourcing, sales forecasting, design, behavioral economics.

Personal & Business: New-wave philanthropy, development economics, sub-Sahara Africa, local empowerment, sustainability, donor involvement, and non-profit management.

milestones.description: Started Dress Code in Salt Lake City on March 1, 2012 as a co-founder.  Currently serves as chairman/CEO.
